name: Purified Water
description: Clean water, free of radiation. A rare commodity in the wasteland, purified water is essential for survival, restoring health and quenching thirst without any harmful side effects.

name: Dirty Water
description: Water with a minor amount of radiation. Commonly found in the wasteland, it restores health but adds rads, making it a less desirable option for hydration.

name: Nuka-Cola
description: The iconic pre-war soft drink, Nuka-Cola is a carbonated beverage that restores health and provides a small boost to Action Points. Its refreshing taste makes it a favorite among wastelanders.

name: Nuka-Cherry
description: A cherry-flavored variant of the classic Nuka-Cola, this drink restores health, increases Action Points, and adds a small amount of rads. Its sweet taste is beloved by many.

name: Nuka-Cola Quantum
description: A rare and powerful version of Nuka-Cola, Quantum significantly restores health and boosts Action Points. Its vibrant blue glow and unique flavor make it a prized find.

name: Beer
description: A bottle of pre-war beer. This alcoholic beverage increases strength but decreases intelligence. It's a common drink for those looking to unwind after a long day in the wasteland.

name: Whiskey
description: A bottle of pre-war whiskey. This strong drink temporarily increases strength and charisma but decreases intelligence. It's favored by many wastelanders for its warming effect.

name: Wine
description: A bottle of pre-war wine. This alcoholic beverage provides a minor boost to charisma but reduces intelligence. It's a more refined choice for those in the wasteland.

name: Mutfruit Juice
description: Freshly squeezed juice made from Mutfruit, a common wasteland fruit. It restores health and provides a small boost to endurance, making it a healthy choice for survival.

name: Gwinett Stout
description: A specific brand of pre-war beer with unique effects. This stout increases strength and charisma but significantly decreases intelligence, making it a bold choice for wasteland adventurers.

name: Gwinett Ale
description: Another popular brand from Gwinett Brewery. This ale provides a slight boost to strength while decreasing intelligence, a favorite among wastelanders.

name: Nuka-Cola Dark
description: A rare alcoholic version of Nuka-Cola found in the Nuka-World DLC. This drink provides unique buffs and is favored by those looking for a stronger drink.

name: Nuka-Cola Victory
description: Another unique variant of Nuka-Cola, Victory provides a mix of health restoration and AP boost with a small radiation penalty.

name: Nuka-Cola Quartz
description: Found in the Nuka-World DLC, this variant glows with a white hue and provides health restoration along with AP boost.

name: Melon Juice
description: Juice made from the melons found in the Commonwealth. It restores health and provides a minor buff to endurance.

name: Irradiated Blood
description: A vial of blood that restores health but adds a significant amount of radiation. Often used by those in desperate need of healing.

name: Silt Bean Tea
description: A warm beverage brewed from silt beans. Restores health and provides a minor buff to intelligence, popular among wasteland scholars.

name: Carrot Flower Nectar
description: Nectar made from carrot flowers. Restores health and provides a minor buff to perception, favored by wasteland scouts.

name: Vim
description: A regional competitor to Nuka-Cola, this beverage restores health and provides a small boost to AP. Its unique taste has a dedicated fan base.

name: Vim Refresh
description: A special variant of Vim, Refresh restores health, boosts AP, and adds no rads, making it highly sought after.
